column1: #Title:    JWST thermal background spectrum to match backgrounds measured in Cycles 1 and 2

column2: Distribution:  unlimited (STI approval in NASA form 1675B.)
Columns: wavelength (micron) and equivalent sky radiance (MJy/SR)
SUMMARY: This is the self-emission thermal background spectrum for JWST
for use in planning observations.  At long wavelengths
from the observatory dominates over astrophysical backgrounds.
